name: UpdateProductImageMailchimp
description:
Update a product image in an e-commerce store.

This tool updates a specific product image within a Mailchimp e-commerce store. Use it when you need to modify an image associated with a product in a store managed by Mailchimp.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the e-commerce store.

parameters.name: product_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a product in the store. Used to specify which product's image should be updated.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: product_image_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product image to update.

value_schema.description: The id for the product image.

parameters.name: product_image_unique_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a specific product image to be updated in the store.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

parameters.name: product_image_url
parameters.description: The URL of the product image to be updated.

value_schema.description: The URL for a product image.

parameters.name: variant_ids
parameters.description: A list of product variant IDs associated with the image. Each variant ID should be a string.

value_schema.description: The list of product variants using the image.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The id for the product of a store.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The id for the product image.

value_schema.description: The id for the product image.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL for a product image.

value_schema.description: The URL for a product image.

parameters.name: variant_ids
parameters.description: The list of product variants using the image.

value_schema.description: The list of product variants using the image.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
